attributes.review:
Took 5 years to download. When you open the app it shows you trumps nudes 🤮🤢. But there’s not much to see. Threatened to nuke me when I tried to delete it! We all know who should be president....HARRY STYLES

attributes.review: I was really looking forward to using this app to stay up to day with the upcoming presidential election, but it turns out to buy completely useless:/

attributes.review: I HATE THIS APP. For starters, it is infested with bugs, rude posts, weird statements. I really was a trump supporter until I downloaded this app. I don’t understand how the trump administration sleeps at night knowing what’s on this app. I know who I’m not going to vote for.
attributes.title: Worst app ever.

attributes.review: This app is being ran by a racist,sexist, homophobe who doesn’t know the difference between “their” and “there” I wish I could give a worst rating because this man is plain out terrible
attributes.title: TERRIBLE
